profile.noti-desc: The Notification will be sent to your registered email address. You can Switch On/Off
profile.noti-verbiage_old: You can switch the notification on or off by clicking on the pill icon. Green indicates it is turned on while grey indicates it is turned off.
profile.noti-verbiage: Turn On or Off the notification by clicking the toggle switch.

noti.miss-therapy-days-desc: You will get Notification email if you missed therapy for three or more days.
noti.miss-therapy-new: You will receive a notification if one or more of your patients missed a day of therapy.
noti.hmr-non-adher-desc: You will get Notification email if your HMR Non-Adherence is below protocol for three or more days.
noti.hmr-non-adher-new: You will receive a notification if one or more of your patients did not complete the therapy time in their protocol.
noti.setting-deviation-desc: You will get Notification email if your frequency is 15% below protocol for three or more days.
noti.setting-dev-new: You will receive a notification if one or more of your patients frequency setting was 15% below protocol.
noti.message-new: You will receive a notification if you have one or more messages in your clinic's inbox.

noti_patient.miss-therapy-days-desc: You will get Notification email if you missed therapy for three or more days.
noti_patient.miss-therapy-new: You will receive a notification if you missed a day of therapy.
noti_patient.hmr-non-adher-desc: You will get Notification email if your HMR Non-Adherence is below protocol for three or more days.
noti_patient.hmr-non-adher-new: You will receive a notification if you did not complete the therapy time in your protocol.
noti_patient.setting-deviation-desc: You will get Notification email if your frequency is 15% below protocol for three or more days.
noti_patient.setting-dev-new: You will receive a notification if your frequency setting was 15% below protocol.
noti_patient.message-new: You will receive a notification if you have one or more messages in your inbox.

noti_hcp.miss-therapy-days-desc: You will receive a notification if one or more of your patients missed a day of therapy.
noti_hcp.hmr-non-adher-desc: You will receive a notification if one or more of your patients did not complete the therapy time in their protocol.
noti_hcp.setting-deviation-desc: You will receive a notification if one or more of your patients frequency setting was 15% below protocol.
noti_hcp.message-new: You will receive a notification if you have one or more messages in your clinic's inbox.

hcp-profile-update.message: You have made changes/updates for HCP Profile. Are you sure to make updates?

clinicadmin-profile-update.message: You have made changes/updates for Clinic Profile. Are you sure to make updates?

update.message: You have made changes/updates for your profile. Are you sure to make updates?

passwordUpdate.message: You are updating your password and will no longer be able to access using this password again. Are you sure to continue?

emailUpdate.message: You are updating your email and will no longer be able to access using this email again. Are you sure to continue?

securityQuestion.message: Are you sure to update your Security Question and Answer?
